name: Conway
description: Conway's game of life, which is a classic cellular automaton.

name: Evolved Salesman
description: Genetic algorithm solving the traveling salesman problem.

name: Orbital
description: Simulation of gravitational forces between multiple bodies in space.

name: Raycast
description: Run around a maze with this raycasting engine, similar to Wolfenstein 3D. In React.

name: Raytrace
description: Simple raytracer of a couple small moons in orbit around a planet. Based on an article on the subject.

name: Standfast
description: Rails application for collecting and sharing team updates via email.

name: Tetris
description: The classic tile-matching, puzzle-solving, block-falling game that we all know and love.

name: Waves
description: Combine two oscillating waves into a third.
